src:
Emprunt: Black Sea Trade and Development Bank lève 200 millions
06 Nov 2019, 12:03 by AWP

Le taux est fixé à 0,45% et l’échéance est en 2023.

Black Sea Trade and Development Bank, qui bénéfice de la garantie des Etats bordant la mer en question, a émis sous la direction de Credit Suisse un emprunt aux conditions suivantes:



Montant 

200 millions de francs 



Taux d'intérêt

0,45% 



Prix d'émission

100,057%



Durée

3,5 ans, jusqu’au 13.0.6.2023



Libération

13.12.2019



Rendement

0,434%



Ecart de swap

+102 points de base



No valeur

050’501’196 (2)



Rating

A2/A- (Moody’s/S&P)



Cotation 

SIX, dès le 11.12.2019



Articles Associés
text:
Loan: Black Sea Trade and Development Bank raises 200 million
06 Nov 2019, 12:03 by AWP

The rate is set at 0.45% and the maturity is in 2023.

Black Sea Trade and Development Bank, which benefits from the guarantee of the States bordering the sea in question, has issued a loan under the direction of Credit Suisse under the following conditions:



Amount

200 million francs



Interest rate

0.45%



Issue price

100.057%



duration

3.5 years, until 13.0.6.2023



Release

12/13/2019



yield

0.434%



Swap gap

+102 basis points



No value

050'501'196 (2)



Rating

A2 / A- (Moody's / S & P)



Quote

SIX, from 11.12.2019



Related Articles
